schemes.name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
schemes.description: A scheme to prevent gender-biased sex selection and promote education for girls.

schemes.name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
schemes.description: A savings scheme for the girl child with high-interest rates and tax benefits.

schemes.name: CBSE Udaan Scheme
schemes.description: Provides free resources to girl students for engineering entrance exams.

schemes.name: Balika Samriddhi Yojana
schemes.description: Financial assistance for girl children born to families below the poverty line.

schemes.name: Ladli Scheme
schemes.description: Financial support for girl child education and welfare.

schemes.name: Kanyashree Prakalpa
schemes.description: A scholarship program for girl students to prevent early marriage.

schemes.name: Dhanalakshmi Scheme
schemes.description: A conditional cash transfer scheme for the education of girl children.

schemes.name: Free Bicycle Scheme
schemes.description: Provides bicycles to school-going girls to improve access to education.

schemes.name: Mukhya Mantri Kanya Utthan Yojana
schemes.description: Provides financial incentives for education and marriage of girl children.

schemes.name: Women Helpline Scheme
schemes.description: A helpline to assist women in distress and provide support services.

India.crimeLaws: India has laws like the POCSO Act, Dowry Prohibition Act, and Domestic Violence Act to protect girl children.

schemes.name: Child Tax Credit
schemes.description: Provides financial support to families with children.

schemes.name: Head Start Program
schemes.description: Provides early childhood education for low-income families.

schemes.name: WIC (Women, Infants, and Children)
schemes.description: A nutrition program providing food and support for young children.

schemes.name: Title IX Education Amendments
schemes.description: Ensures gender equality in education and athletics.

schemes.name: Safe Start Initiative
schemes.description: Helps prevent and address children's exposure to violence.

schemes.name: Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act
schemes.description: Ensures fair treatment of minors in the justice system.

schemes.name: Family and Youth Services Bureau
schemes.description: Provides grants and programs for youth empowerment.

schemes.name: Girl Scouts Grants
schemes.description: Supports leadership and education programs for girls.

schemes.name: National School Lunch Program
schemes.description: Provides free or low-cost lunches in public schools.

schemes.name: Violence Against Women Act Grants
schemes.description: Federal grants for programs addressing domestic violence and child safety.

USA.crimeLaws: USA enforces child protection laws like Amber Alerts, Safe Haven Laws, and Anti-Human Trafficking Laws.

schemes.name: Child Benefit
schemes.description: Provides monthly payments for parents raising children.

schemes.name: Sure Start Maternity Grant
schemes.description: A one-time grant for low-income families expecting a child.

schemes.name: Education Maintenance Allowance
schemes.description: Supports students from low-income families to continue education.

schemes.name: Free School Meals
schemes.description: Ensures free meals for eligible students.

schemes.name: Healthy Start
schemes.description: Provides food and vitamins to pregnant women and young children.

schemes.name: Social Mobility Foundation
schemes.description: Supports young girls in pursuing higher education and careers.

schemes.name: Girls’ Education Challenge
schemes.description: Focuses on improving education access for girls.

UK.crimeLaws: UK enforces the Child Protection Act, Domestic Abuse Bill, and Gender Equality Act.

schemes.name: Canada Child Benefit

schemes.name: Women in STEM Initiative
schemes.description: Encourages girls to pursue STEM education.

Canada.crimeLaws: Canada has strict laws on gender-based violence, child abuse, and equal rights enforcement.

schemes.name: Family Tax Benefit
schemes.description: Provides financial support to families raising children.

schemes.name: Kindergeld
